=== Additional Information ===
Join us to celebrate the release of Intrepid Ibex!

We are going to try to have some home made CDs to hand out.

New for this party! Bring a 1GB or larger flash drive and we'll set you up with a LiveUSB version of Intrepid Ibex! (Time and power/battery life permitting)
